title: Ep. 745 Don’t Let The Democrats Get Away With Their Latest Lie
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the Democrats’ new story that they’re using to attack President Trump and to provide cover for Hillary. I also discuss the inside baseball reasons that the FBI management leaned left and the coming economic crisis surrounding the national debt. 
 
News Picks:
Does California prove that liberal economics works?
 
Democrat Senator Feinstein gets called out on her lies.
 
The media hysteria continues on the immigration issue.
 
Are we headed for a debt crisis?
 
Jim Comey is in a world of trouble. 
 
The Southern Poverty Law Center loses big time.
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
